favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.empty: You don't have any favorite verses yet
favorites.noFavoritesDescription: Start reading the Bible and mark your favorite verses by clicking the heart icon.

tips.title: How to use Favorites
tips.tip1: Click the heart icon on any verse to add it to favorites
tips.tip2: Your favorites are saved locally in your browser
tips.tip3: Use favorites to revisit verses that touched your heart
tips.tip4: You can remove favorites individually or clear all at once

notes.noNotesDescription: Start adding your personal reflections on Bible verses.
notes.notePlaceholder: Write your reflection or note about this verse...

tips.title: How to use Notes
tips.tip1: Add your personal reflections on specific verses
tips.tip2: Use notes to record insights, prayers or practical applications
tips.tip3: Your notes are saved locally in your browser
tips.tip4: You can edit or delete your notes at any time
tips.tip5: Notes help deepen your personal Bible study
